## Radiant - Business analytics using R and Shiny

Radiant is designed to facilitate decision making in business using data and models. It is currently used in the Research for Marketing Decisions and Quantitative Analysis classes at the <a href="http://rady.ucsd.edu/" target="\_blank">Rady School of Management</a> by <a href="http://rady.ucsd.edu/faculty/directory/nijs/" target="\_blank">Vincent Nijs</a> and <a href="http://rady.ucsd.edu/faculty/directory/august/">Terrence August</a>. Developed by <a href="http://rady.ucsd.edu/faculty/directory/nijs/" target="\_blank">Vincent Nijs</a>. For questions and comments please contact me at radiant@rady.ucsd.edu.
